name: dagster-cloud-cicd-action
description: Builds and pushes Dagster repo Docker images and updates the corresponding Dagster Cloud repo locations.

scripts.prepare: ncc build src/deploy-action.js -o dist/deploy --source-map --license licenses.txt && ncc build src/preview-action.js -o dist/preview --source-map --license licenses.txt && ncc build src/update-only-action.js -o dist/update-only --source-map --license licenses.txt
scripts.all: yarn lint && yarn prepare && yarn test

author: Dagster
